service.name: List
service.note: 教务员查看全部课程列表

parameter.value: SELECT course_id id, course_no courseNo, course_name courseName, teacher_no teacherNo, course_size courseSize, course_enrollment courseEnrollment, deadline deadline, course_credits courseCredits, course_period coursePeriod, apply_time applyTime, course_restriction_grade courseRestrictionGrade, course_restriction_major courseRestrictionMajor, course_status courseStatus, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM course WHERE 1 = 1 #{not_nvl(status,' AND course_status = ' + bind('status'))} #{not_nvl(teacherNo,' AND teacher_no = ' + bind('teacherNo'))}

service.name: ById
service.note: 通过课程ID查询课程信息

parameter.value: UPDATE course SET update_date = now() ,course_status = 'REJECTED' WHERE course_id = #{bind('id')}

service.name: RoomList
service.note: 查询指定时间可用教室列表

parameter.value: SELECT course_room_id id, room_id roomId, room_time roomTime, idle idle, course_id courseId FROM course_room_list WHERE 1=1 AND room_time =#{bind('roomTime')} AND idle ='1' ORDER BY course_room_id
UPDATE course_room_list SET update_date = now() ,idle = '0' ,course_id = #{bind('courseId')} WHERE course_room_id = #{bind('id')}
